jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer
jobs_results.description:
Opis tvrtke

Mono d.o.o. jedan je od vodeƒáih hrvatskih izvoznika softvera te dobitnik brojnih domaƒáih i meƒëunarodnih nagrada i priznanja za uspjeh u poslovanju. S preko 20 godina iskustva rada u brojnim industrijama i uz usklaƒëen tim od vi≈°e od 150 poslovnih analitiƒçara, developera, dizajnera, voditelja projekta i testera, pokrivamo sve aspekte projektiranja i izrade softvera.

Implementirali smo vrhunska rje≈°enja, kako za startupe s jednim zaposlenikom, tako i za velike multinacionalne kompanije ‚Äì imamo znanje, iskustvo i strast za stvaranjem naprednih softverskih rje≈°enja. Osim toga, aktivno radimo i na rastu i razvoju struƒçne zajednice, kao i na pobolj≈°anju moguƒánosti obrazovanja te izgradnji buduƒáih IT struƒçnjaka.

Opis posla

Kao Mobile Developer u Monu na razvoju mobilnih aplikacija za korisnike u veƒáem broju industrijskih ni≈°a. Redovno ƒáe≈° suraƒëivati s kolegama koji razvijaju backend funkcionalnost na≈°ih rje≈°enja te sudjelovati u osmi≈°ljavanju, dizajniranju, testiranju i odr≈æavanju mobilnih rje≈°enja.

Kvalifikacije

Osim tehniƒçkih vje≈°tina, ≈æeljeli bismo da na≈° buduƒái kolega odgovara i kulturi rada na≈°e tvrtke, a ono ≈°to cijenimo je:

Dodatne informacije

Zato nudimo:

jobs_results.title: Senior Mobile Engineer
jobs_results.description:
‚Ä¢ **PLEASE NOTE: Although this position is "remote," the applicant MUST live and work in either Croatia, Germany or Sweden***

About the role:
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, document and implement solutions for Glooko‚Äôs Mobile applications
‚Ä¢ Partner with engineers, architects & product management to implement end to end applications
‚Ä¢ MVVM Architectures and reactive programming
‚Ä¢ Maintaining software quality and adopt right architectural principles
‚Ä¢ Functional and design patterns with a focus on performance, security and scalability
‚Ä¢ Proven ability to be an independent thinker and dynamic problem solver
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, document and implement solutions for Glooko's Diabetes Data Management platform
‚Ä¢ Develop, test, or modify programs, based on and related to user or system design specifications
‚Ä¢ Write code that is scalable, modular, maintainable, reusable, and well-tested
‚Ä¢ Optimize complex data models for understandability and performance
‚Ä¢ Work in an agile development environment with understanding of agile/lean delivery methods
‚Ä¢ Design, develop and oversee unit tests to ensure application logic is fully exercised for each application component
‚Ä¢ Communicate effectively with team and other stakeholders on stages and project completion goals or dates
‚Ä¢ Provide technical oversight to the development process including code reviews and mentoring of the technical team
‚Ä¢ Deliver end-to-end solutions with a focus on hitting delivery milestones

About you:
‚Ä¢ Bachelor Degree in Computer Science, Math, or Engineering
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of software development experience
‚Ä¢ 3+ years experience developing mobile apps that have been successfully delivered to customers
‚Ä¢ Experience in designing, coding, and debugging mobile applications for various platforms, such as iOS or Android, using programming languages like Swift and Kotlin
‚Ä¢ Strong attention to detail and knowledge of MVVM design patterns
‚Ä¢ Ability to work well in a team while providing technical guidance and mentoring to junior engineers on mobile development best practices, code reviews, and architectural decisions
‚Ä¢ Excellent written and verbal communications skills
‚Ä¢ Experience and knowledge of Scrum and Agile tools. JIRA and Atlassian tools experience is a plus
‚Ä¢ Experience in modern deployments through a CI/CD pipeline
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of Core Foundation and UIKit, including View Controller lifecycle, notifications, and delegation along with Core Bluetooth and HealthKit experience is a plus

About Glooko:

There are over 420 million people in the world with diabetes and Glooko helps them, as well as their physicians and care team, manage the disease more easily and cost effectively. Glooko is the Unified Platform for Diabetes Management and provides an FDA cleared, HIPAA compliant Web and Mobile (iOS and Android) application for people with diabetes and the clinicians who treat them. The platform seamlessly unifies data from over 80 of the leading blood glucose meters, insulin pumps, continuous glucose monitors, activity trackers, and biometric devices to deliver insights that improve personal and clinical decision support.

Glooko‚Äôs mobile app and web dashboard enable patients to easily track and proactively manage all aspects of their diabetes care. Glooko‚Äôs Population Tracker and APIs offer diabetes-centric analytics and supply insightful reports, graphs and pattern-triggered notifications to patients, health systems, and payers. The Glooko platform also allows customers and third-party developers to create branded modules for Glooko users.

Launched in 2010, Glooko is funded and managed by visionary technologists and leaders in healthcare.

Glooko has a global footprint and is funded and managed by visionary technologists and leaders in healthcare. We offer a very stimulating international challenge in an established, stable international company. The responsibility that comes with this role offers the right candidate great development opportunities ‚Äì and all the excitement that comes with working at a Silicon Valley based company. We are looking for someone who wants to be a part of our organization for the future with great influence and great responsibility.

Is this you? If so, don‚Äôt hesitate to apply today!

jobs_results.title: Senior Native Mobile App Developer (Offshore)
jobs_results.description:
Senior Native Mobile App Developer (Offshore)
‚Ä¢ Location: Offshore/Remote
‚Ä¢ Working Hours: UK business hours, 9am-5pm, Mon-Fri, weekly
‚Ä¢ Pay Rate: Up to ¬£2000 GBP per month, fixed
‚Ä¢ Employment Type: Full-time Freelance Contract (40hrs per week)
‚Ä¢ Language Requirements: Must be fluent in English both verbally & in writing
‚Ä¢ Start Date: January 2025 start
‚Ä¢ Project Duration: 6+ months (estimated), high likelihood of renewal

About Handyman Interactive

We are an innovative software development firm dedicated to partnering with our clients to build specialised engineering teams tailored for startups and SMEs/SMBs. Our technology-first approach ensures that we meet the bespoke needs of each client by delivering game-changing solutions. We are looking for a dedicated Senior Native Mobile App Developer to join our remote team.

Role Overview

This role is perfect for an experienced developer who excels in both native iOS development using Swift and native Android development using Java. The role involves working closely with stakeholders to gather and clarify requirements, demonstrating working software, and serving as a senior or lead mobile developer within a team-oriented environment.

Key Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Develop, implement, and maintain high-quality native mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate directly with stakeholders to elicit and clarify requirements, ensuring a clear understanding of project goals.
‚Ä¢ Demonstrate working software to stakeholders, incorporating feedback into iterative development.
‚Ä¢ Take the lead in mobile development projects, ensuring alignment with industry best practices, and guide less experienced team members.
‚Ä¢ Contribute to the continuous improvement of software development processes.
‚Ä¢ Participate in code reviews, providing and receiving constructive feedback.
‚Ä¢ Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in mobile app development to ensure forward-thinking solutions.

Key Requirements
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of comprehensive experience in native mobile app development, with expertise in both Swift for iOS and Java for Android.
‚Ä¢ Proven ability to engage with stakeholders effectively and translate business requirements into clear technical specifications.
‚Ä¢ Exceptional ability to deliver high-quality software within deadlines.
‚Ä¢ Fluent proficiency in English, both written and verbal.
‚Ä¢ Ability and willingness to work within UK timezone business hours.
‚Ä¢ Strong problem-solving skills and a proactive mindset towards challenges.

What Handyman Interactive Offers
‚Ä¢ A supportive and dynamic work environment.
‚Ä¢ Engagement in exciting projects that innovate and drive business success.
‚Ä¢ Remote work flexibility as a full-time freelancer, set at 40 hours per week.
‚Ä¢ Competitive pay of up to ¬£2000 per month, fixed.

Join our offshore freelance team and contribute to projects that are making a real difference through innovation in mobile technology!

jobs_results.title: Senior Flutter Developer
jobs_results.description:
Join Our Development Team at UniqCast!

UniqCast is expanding, and we are excited to announce a new full-time opportunity within our Development Department: Senior Flutter Developer. We are looking for an experienced and dedicated engineer to lead our mobile development initiatives.

Additional details:

‚Ä¢ Location: Zagreb, Croatia

‚Ä¢ Type of Work: Full-time, 5 days a week

‚Ä¢ Employment Agreement: Permanent Employment Work Agreement

‚Ä¢ Work Type: Hybrid work model with the option to work remotely multiple days per week

Why Join Us?:

‚Ä¢ Competitive salary based on senior-level experience with promotion and bonus schema

‚Ä¢ Christmas bonus and vacation allowance

‚Ä¢ A reward system based on the years working with us

‚Ä¢ A three-month mentoring program as part of your onboarding schedule

‚Ä¢ Access to education (books, seminars, conferences, and certification programs)

‚Ä¢ Complimentary coffee, tea, soft drinks, fruit, and snacks

‚Ä¢ Up to 30 days of paid leave per year based on your experience and family obligations

‚Ä¢ Access to team-building activities (team fitness challenges, running club, team-buildings, workshops, monthly office lunches, and more)

‚Ä¢ Multisport card

Senior Flutter Developer job duties and responsibilities:

‚Ä¢ Lead the development of cutting-edge video streaming mobile applications using Flutter

‚Ä¢ Architect and implement complex user interfaces across multiple platforms (iOS, Android, Web, Smart TV)

‚Ä¢ Establish technical standards and best practices for the Flutter development team

‚Ä¢ Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews

‚Ä¢ Collaborate with UX designers to create optimized cross-platform user interfaces

‚Ä¢ Work closely with dev-ops engineers to integrate apps with content delivery systems

‚Ä¢ Optimize applications for maximum performance across different devices and platforms

‚Ä¢ Guide technical decision-making and drive innovation within the team

Senior Flutter Developer job requirements and qualifications:

‚Ä¢ 5+ years of professional software development experience, with 3+ years in Flutter

‚Ä¢ Proven track record of leading Flutter development teams and projects

‚Ä¢ Strong proficiency in Dart and Flutter's core principles

‚Ä¢ Experience with state management solutions (especially RiverPod) in large-scale applications

‚Ä¢ Expert knowledge of Flutter's architecture and performance optimization techniques

‚Ä¢ Experience with modern build tools and CI/CD pipelines

‚Ä¢ Strong leadership and mentoring abilities

‚Ä¢ Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail

‚Ä¢ Outstanding communication and team collaboration capabilities

We expect the ideal Senior Flutter Developer candidates to be well acquainted with these technologies and have the capability to master new ones:

‚Ä¢ Advanced experience with Flutter's ecosystem (Freezed, Build_runner, Dio)

‚Ä¢ Deep understanding of platform-specific implementation details

‚Ä¢ Knowledge of responsive and adaptive design principles across platforms

‚Ä¢ Version control systems (preferably Git)

‚Ä¢ Testing frameworks for Flutter applications

‚Ä¢ Experience with native plugin development

Bonus qualifications:

‚Ä¢ Knowledge of native mobile development (Kotlin, Swift, or Objective-C)

‚Ä¢ Experience with Smart TV application development

‚Ä¢ Understanding of video streaming technologies (e.g., HLS, DASH)

‚Ä¢ Prior experience with web technologies (JavaScript, TypeScript)

‚Ä¢ Experience in the OTT industry

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with accessibility considerations for mobile applications

And last but not least:

‚Ä¢ Opportunity to lead technical initiatives that impact millions of viewers across the globe

‚Ä¢ Work with cutting-edge mobile technologies

‚Ä¢ Be a key player in a growing, successful company competing on a global level

Hiring process:

1. Initial Interview: We will review all resumes, and if we find that you might be a good match for us, you will be invited to an initial interview. This interview is usually held via video call.

2. Technical Assessment: If you pass the initial Interview you will be sent a technical assignment with a three-day deadline.

3. In-depth Technical Interview and Assignment Solution Presentation: After delivering your solution, you will be invited to present it via video call.

4. Final Interview: Candidates who show the most potential will be invited to a final interview. In this interview, we will discuss your / our expectations, and we will assess the level of alignment with our organizational goals. This interview is typically done in person.

5. Job Offer: If all goes well, you will receive a written job offer. If you decide to accept our offer, we can begin the employment process.

Send your resume to jobs@uniqcast.com. Your resume can be written in Croatian or English.

We will be accepting resumes until January 15th, 2025.

jobs_results.title: Developer Support Engineer
jobs_results.description:
About us:

RevenueCat makes building, analyzing, and growing mobile subscriptions easy. We launched as part of Y Combinator's summer 2018 batch and today are handling more than $4B of in-app purchases annually across thousands of apps.

We are a mission driven, remote-first company that is building the standard for mobile subscription infrastructure. Top apps like ChatGPT, VSCO, Notion, and ClassDojo count on RevenueCat to power their subscriptions at scale.

Our 80 team members (and growing!) are located all over the world, from San Francisco to Madrid to Taipei. We're a close-knit, product-driven team, and we strive to live our core values: Customer Obsession, Always Be Shipping, Own It, and Balance.

The Role

If you‚Äôre looking to jumpstart your career in tech and have a direct impact on apps used by billions of end-users, the Developer Support Engineer (DSE) role at RevenueCat is a fantastic opportunity. This is one of the few entry-level positions we offer, and it has proven to be an incredible stepping stone‚Äîour current Support Lead, a Product Manager, and a Technical Account Manager each started out as DSEs.

In this role, you‚Äôll help developers integrate the RevenueCat SDK into their apps, troubleshoot tricky edge cases, and unlock new possibilities in subscription monetization. You‚Äôll provide hands-on support for some of the biggest apps in the world‚Äîimagine helping the teams behind ChatGPT, VSCO, PhotoRoom, Notion, and others get the best out of RevenueCat. You‚Äôll be empowered to own the support experience, build out internal tools, and identify improvements that shape how developers everywhere use RevenueCat.

In 2024, our DSEs spoke at conferences in Berlin, Logro√±o, New York, London, and Tokyo. This is optional, but if you're interested, you can meet RevenueCat customers face to face, have fun working our booth, and share your knowledge with developers worldwide.

What you‚Äôll be responsible for
‚Ä¢ Supporting developers daily. You‚Äôll debug issues, untangle complex code paths, and guide developers through onboarding so they can ship subscription features confidently.
‚Ä¢ Collaborating cross-functionally. You‚Äôll partner closely with Engineering and Product to influence the developer experience‚Äîeverything from our documentation to new features.
‚Ä¢ Building tooling and processes. You‚Äôll craft or improve the internal apps and dashboards that make troubleshooting faster and easier, both for you and your teammates.
‚Ä¢ Driving user success. From investigating stack traces to clarifying best practices, you‚Äôll ensure developers can move from ‚Äúblocked‚Äù to ‚Äúshipped‚Äù without missing a beat.

Within your first month, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Deep-dive into the frustrations and roadblocks developers face, helping them get unblocked so they can launch their apps.
‚Ä¢ Familiarize yourself with our support tools and processes.
‚Ä¢ Propose and implement quick wins in our documentation and support articles to reduce common developer pitfalls.
‚Ä¢ Work alongside our engineering team to resolve complex issues and learn the ins and outs of subscription infrastructure.

Within your first 3 months, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Spot opportunities for product improvements that will reduce developer friction.
‚Ä¢ Build out test apps and reproducible environments to tackle issues head-on.
‚Ä¢ Own onboarding and solution engineering for new developers using RevenueCat, providing a seamless start-to-finish experience.

Within your first 6 months, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Identify recurring blockers and implement targeted improvements‚Äîboth in our products and in your own support workflows.
‚Ä¢ Craft (and refine) internal dashboards and tooling that accelerate the DSE team‚Äôs efficiency.
‚Ä¢ Make meaningful, self-directed contributions to how we scale support for an ever-growing developer community.

After 12 months, you‚Äôll have:
‚Ä¢ Gained super-hero level intuition for diagnosing the root causes of even the trickiest tickets.
‚Ä¢ Led the charge on hiring, mentoring, and growing our support engineering team.
‚Ä¢ Found new ways to delight developers, turning frustrating subscription problems into smooth, joyful experiences.

About you
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre eager to learn and grow; this is one of the few entry-level positions at RevenueCat and has historically launched multiple careers within our company.
‚Ä¢ You have 2-3 years of experience in an engineering or technical role, or have built and shipped a mobile app that integrates RevenueCat.
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre comfortable with either iOS (Swift / Objective-C) or Android (Java / Kotlin) and have a grasp of app development and release processes.
‚Ä¢ You can debug code with minimal info, diagnosing issues from cryptic logs or stack traces.
‚Ä¢ You thrive in an environment that requires creative problem-solving and a ‚Äúget it done‚Äù mentality.
‚Ä¢ You have strong written and verbal communication skills, and you‚Äôre empathetic towards the developer journey.

What you‚Äôll need to be successful
‚Ä¢ Technical curiosity and a willingness to learn new tools and frameworks.
‚Ä¢ Resourcefulness in figuring out solutions when the path isn‚Äôt obvious.
‚Ä¢ Clear communication skills to translate complex issues into helpful, actionable steps.
‚Ä¢ Outcome-oriented mindset, ensuring your support leads to measurable developer success‚Äîfewer tickets, better documentation, and happier customers.
‚Ä¢ Collaboration and comfort with a fully remote, asynchronous setup using tools like Slack, Zoom, Linear, and Notion.

What we offer:
‚Ä¢ $112,000 USD Salary regardless of your location
‚Ä¢ Competitive equity in a fast-growing, Series B startup backed by top tier investors including Y Combinator
‚Ä¢ 10 year window to exercise vested equity options
‚Ä¢ Fully remote work environment that promotes autonomy and flexibility
‚Ä¢ Suggested 4 to 5 weeks time off to recharge and focus on mental, physical, and emotional health
‚Ä¢ $2,000 USD to build your personal workspace
‚Ä¢ $1,000 USD annual stipend for your continuous learning and growth

Curious about the interview process? Discover more in our blog post about how we hire and learn tips to help you succeed.

jobs_results.title: Flutter Mobile Developer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Portugal

The role is restricted to those physically located in Europe, while this is a remote position, we cannot consider candidates that are not based in such region. Preference will be given to candidates based in Portugal, Spain or Malta.

We are looking for an enthusiastic Flutter Mobile Developer to help maintain and develop our sports mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ As a Flutter Mobile Developer you are expected to ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢ Write clean, well-documented, and maintainable code for Flutter application
‚Ä¢ Develop and maintain technical documentation for the applications
‚Ä¢ Identify the causes of the most complex issues and implement practical and efficient technical solutions
‚Ä¢ Implement both backend and front-end features
‚Ä¢ Coordinate with UX/UI designers, developers, and test engineers in an Agile environment
‚Ä¢ Abide by industry and company software development standards
‚Ä¢ Conduct code reviews and give feedback to other developers
‚Ä¢ Understand the big picture and offer insightful advice about technologies and projects
‚Ä¢ Be proactive in identifying and communicating potential risks and issues to the team and stakeholders
‚Ä¢ Participate in sprint planning, estimation, and retrospective meetings
‚Ä¢ Keep up-to-date with the latest mobile app development trends and technologies
‚Ä¢ Work in close partnership with cross-functional teams and management
‚Ä¢ Ensure code quality by writing tests, using SonarQube, etc.
‚Ä¢ Success in this role means...
‚Ä¢ Collaborating towards a team effort to improve the overall user experience of our applications.
‚Ä¢ Developing DRY, clean, maintainable and scalable code that can be comprehended and worked on solely through documentation created.
‚Ä¢ Increasing the performance, scalability and security of our mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ You have acquired proficient communication skills in the English language through team collaboration.

This offer from "Raketech" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 86% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Belarus, Poland, Kazakhstan

We are looking for experienced Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers to join our core product ‚Äì BOSS Revolution.

You have a chance to work with a team of outstanding professionals on a challenging product.

You will never be bored‚Äîour team is dynamic, as are our products. Be ready to face thrilling professional challenges and use your strong hard and soft skills to solve them as a Team player.

Your primary responsibility is end-to-end development and support of our user experience in our customer-facing apps.

Join us if you want to:
‚Ä¢ Have a unique work experience with a really strong engineering team!
‚Ä¢ Become a part of a multinational and cross-functional team.
‚Ä¢ Boost your career with a big international product company and have new growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Work on new innovative features and bug fixes in a Scrum Team.
‚Ä¢ Take responsibility for the full software development life-cycle.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with business stakeholders and be a part of the product development team.
‚Ä¢ Demonstrate your technology-agnostic positive attitude with the ability to learn and desire to implement solutions using various technologies.
‚Ä¢ Work on high-performing, mission-critical, scalable, and resilient applications and services.
‚Ä¢ Drive aggressive technical debt reduction in close collaboration with developers and automation test engineers.
Join us, if you have:
‚Ä¢ Have around one year of Flutter cross-platform development experience.
‚Ä¢ Have 5+ years of hands-on mobile development experience (Android and/or iOS).
‚Ä¢ Are truly passionate about mobile development.
‚Ä¢ Can communicate in English (B2+).
‚Ä¢ Are a constant learner.
You can please us with:
‚Ä¢ Experience in configuring mobile CI pipelines.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge and experience beyond mobile stack.
We offer you:
‚Ä¢ An exciting and challenging job with talented people around.
‚Ä¢ Really good hardware (a laptop with 32 GB RAM and 512 GB SSD).
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Remote work opportunity (with the opportunity to work from offices in Minsk and Warsaw).
‚Ä¢ Superb English lessons.A few words about us:

IDT Corporation is a global communications company founded in 1990 and headquartered in Newark, New Jersey. We are industry leaders in prepaid communication and payment services and one of the largest international voice carriers. We are listed on the NYSE, employ over 1800 people across 20 countries, and have over $1.5 billion in revenues.

We are not ‚Äùanother big IT corporation‚Äù‚Äî we encourage and support in-house entrepreneurs in developing their ideas into business actions.

Our flagship brand, Boss Revolution, offers Money Transfer, International Calling, and Mobile Top-Up services and supports IDT‚Äôs mission of enabling people to keep in touch and share resources with family and friends worldwide.

If you are here, it seems like you are interested, so let‚Äôs chat! üòâ

This offer from "IDT Corporation" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
We believe that we are better together, and at Tripadvisor we welcome you for who you are. Our workplace is for everyone, as is our people powered platform. At Tripadvisor, we want you to bring your unique We believe that we are better together, and at Tripadvisor we welcome you for who you are. Our workplace is for everyone, as is our people powered platform. At Tripadvisor, we want you to bring your unique perspective and experiences, so we can collectively revolutionize travel and together find the good out there.

Want to be part of a team working on the world‚Äôs largest travel platform? Tripadvisor aims to make everyone a better traveler by creating products that help people around the world plan and have the perfect trip. As part of the team responsible for our Flagship apps, you get to work on products impacting many millions of monthly active visitors worldwide.

During the pandemic our engineering, product, and design teams went back to first principles and redesigned our Flagship mobile apps and the platforms they run on from the ground up. Our new apps are an engineer‚Äôs dream to work with: they embrace component-based server-driven UI and clean architecture. Come help us build upon a sound foundation and drive our next wave of growth!

Our Mobile App Product Engineering team is responsible for building and maintaining features in our Flagship iOS and Android apps that delight millions of travelers around the world. This team is looking for a software engineer with experience designing, building, and maintaining Android apps, preferably at scale. The ideal candidate would bring excellent communication skills, technical acumen, and a product-mindset.

What you'll do:
‚Ä¢ Deliver high-quality, scalable features to millions of travelers across many countries and languages.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other engineers to iterate on new features.
‚Ä¢ Practice, uphold, and promote high quality and reliability standards, respect clean code principles, implement unit and integration tests.
‚Ä¢ Provide feedback on technical designs and code reviews to ensure the scalability, maintainability, and robustness of our Android apps.
‚Ä¢ Mentor and lead other engineers

Skills and experience:
‚Ä¢ 6+ years of Android development experience.
‚Ä¢ Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, a related technical field or equivalent practical experience.
‚Ä¢ Strong Computer Science fundamentals.
‚Ä¢ Experience leading small teams and projects.
‚Ä¢ Experience with Kotlin.
‚Ä¢ Experience with Kotlin Coroutines.
‚Ä¢ Experience with Clean Architecture.
‚Ä¢ Experience with large, multi-module projects.
‚Ä¢ Experience with dependency injection.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of mobile architecture patterns (e.g., MVVM).
‚Ä¢ Good understanding of reactive programming.
‚Ä¢ GraphQL know-how.
‚Ä¢ Previous work in an Agile environment.
‚Ä¢ User-centric mindset.
‚Ä¢ A sense of ownership, urgency, and pride in your work.
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.

Nice to haves:
‚Ä¢ Experience with Jetpack Compose.
‚Ä¢ Experience with server-driven UIs.

If you need a reasonable accommodation or support during the application or the recruiting process due to a medical condition or disability, please reach out to your individual recruiter or send an email to AccessibleRecruiting@Tripadvisor.com and let us know the nature of your request. Please include the job requisition number in your message.

#LI-GW1

jobs_results.title: Senior Developer Advocate
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: United States, EMEA

About us:

RevenueCat makes building, analyzing, and growing mobile subscriptions easy. We launched as part of Y Combinator's summer 2018 batch and today are handling more than $4B of in-app purchases annually across thousands of apps.

We are a mission driven, remote-first company that is building the standard for mobile subscription infrastructure. Top apps like VSCO, Notion, and ClassDojo count on RevenueCat to power their subscriptions at scale.

Our 80 team members (and growing!) are located all over the world, from San Francisco to Madrid to Taipei. We're a close-knit, product-driven team, and we strive to live our core values: Customer Obsession, Always Be Shipping, Own It, and Balance.

The Role

RevenueCat helps apps of all shapes and sizes make more money across mobile, the web, and other platforms like Roku and Amazon. As a result, many different types of users log in to ‚Äì and use ‚Äì RevenueCat on a day-to-day basis. Product managers, support reps, lifecycle marketers, user acquisition specialists, data analysts, executives: The list goes on.

None of those users would make it onto RevenueCat unless a developer implements it first. And for smaller apps, developers are these users: They do the marketing, provide support, interpret the performance data, make pricing and packaging decisions, and more.

We‚Äôre looking for a Senior Developer Advocate to help ensure these developers are successful when using RevenueCat. You‚Äôd join forces with our current Advocate, and guy you might have seen walking around Seoul in the rain, Charlie Chapman. We‚Äôre specifically looking for someone with strong skills in producing written educational content targeted at developers that is technical but engaging. Your work will educate existing RevenueCat users, attract new search traffic, and position RevenueCat as the go-to resource when implementing in-app purchases across platforms.

What you‚Äôll be responsible for

Your primary responsibility will be creating high-quality, developer-focused content focused on monetization and in-app purchases. This includes both scenarios where developers use RevenueCat to solve for these use cases, as well as alternative implementations.

Examples of the type of content we‚Äôd expect you to produce include blogpost with titles like:
‚Ä¢ "Migrating a native subscription app to Flutter: A step by step plan"
‚Ä¢ "Implementing your first subscription with RevenueCat: Disable ads for paid users"
‚Ä¢ "How to detect and highlight the platform of purchase for cross-device subscribers"
‚Ä¢ "Adding a multi-tier subscription to your Expo app"

In addition to writing, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Speak at conferences, webinars, and other events to share insights and represent RevenueCat
‚Ä¢ Record videos and collaborate on webinars to help developers implement and succeed with RevenueCat
‚Ä¢ Work cross-functionally to develop resources that support developers using RevenueCat

Within the first month, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Learn RevenueCat inside and out
‚Ä¢ Familiarize yourself with our developer community and how to engage them
‚Ä¢ Have produced your first pieces of RevenueCat content

Within the first 3 months, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with Charlie on a joint content strategy playing to both your strengths
‚Ä¢ Independently research and develop content to fill current gaps in our documentation and other educational efforts
‚Ä¢ Repurpose existing content into new formats (e.g., blog posts into videos) to expand our reach

Within the first 6 months, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Represent RevenueCat at industry conferences and webinars, delivering talks and engaging with developers
‚Ä¢ Support product launches with technical content (written or video)

After 12 months, you‚Äôll have:
‚Ä¢ Become a fixture across the developer community, having become synonymous with RevenueCat and in-app monetization for Android, Flutter, and/or React Native
‚Ä¢ Found new and novel ways to help us engage developers (think Shipaton, App Store Rejection socks, and similar initiatives)

About you

You‚Äôre passionate about teaching and helping developers thrive. You‚Äôre deeply experienced in app development, particularly subscription apps, whether as part of a team or through indie projects (preferably both).

What you‚Äôll need to be successful
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of experience in app development or developer-focused roles, ideally in a subscription app environment, with a deep understanding of at least one major mobile development platform (Android, Flutter, React Native preferred; iOS a strong alternative) and the ability to learn and write about others
‚Ä¢ Strong independent project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple content initiatives, events, and deadlines across time zones without constant oversight
‚Ä¢ Excellent technical communication skills, capable of translating complex technical concepts into accessible and engaging written, video, and spoken formats for developers
‚Ä¢ A passion for teaching and empowering developers, with the ability to create content that educates and inspires action, including blog posts, tutorials, and videos
‚Ä¢ Proven ability to learn and explain new technologies, with expertise in Android development, Flutter, or React Native preferred (experience with iOS development is a plus if paired with a demonstrated ability to adapt to and write about other platforms)
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in producing content for a developer audience, preferably in a professional capacity as a developer advocate, but we‚Äôd consider exceptional candidates that have written, recorded video, and have spoken at conferences targeted at developers as a hobby or side-project
‚Ä¢ Resourcefulness and adaptability, with a problem-solving mindset to navigate the challenges of engaging a global developer community
‚Ä¢ Outcome-driven approach, ensuring your efforts lead to measurable impacts, such as increased content engagement, developer onboarding, and community growth
‚Ä¢ Comfort with a fully remote, asynchronous work environment, and tools like Notion, Zoom, Slack, and Linear. You‚Äôll need to thrive in an environment that balances collaboration with ample time for focused, deep work

We‚Äôre looking for someone who embodies our team‚Äôs core values of agency and intellectual curiosity: taking initiative, solving problems, and continually learning to better serve our diverse developer audience. Regular travel may occasionally be required for conferences, events, or team gatherings.

What we offer:
‚Ä¢ $212,000 USD salary, regardless of location
‚Ä¢ Competitive equity in a fast-growing, Series C startup backed by top-tier investors, including Y Combinator
‚Ä¢ 10-year window to exercise vested equity options
‚Ä¢ Fully remote and flexible work environment
‚Ä¢ 4-5 weeks of suggested time off annually for mental, physical, and emotional recharge
‚Ä¢ $2,000 USD for workspace setup and $1,000 USD annual stipend for continuous learning

Curious about the interview process? Discover more in our blog post about how we hire and learn tips to help you succeed.

This offer from "RevenueCat" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 90% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Senior Mobile Cross-Platform Developer (Firebase)
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: EMEA

About us:

Talent has no borders. Proxify's mission is to connect top developers around the world with opportunities they deserve. So, it doesn't matter where you are; we are here to help you fast-track your independent career in the right direction. üôÇ

Since our launch, Proxify's developers have successfully worked with 1200+ happy clients to build their products and growth features. 3500+ talented developers trust Proxify and its network to fulfil their dreams and objectives.

Proxify is shaped by a global network of supportive, talented developers interested in remote full-time jobs. Our Glassdoor (4.5/5) and Trustpilot (4.8/5) ratings reflect the trust developers place in us and our commitment to our members' success.

The Role:

We are looking for a Senior Mobile Cross-platform Developer with strong proficiency with Firebase for one of our clients. You are a perfect candidate if you are growth-oriented, you love what you do, and you enjoy working on new ideas to develop exciting products.

What we‚Äôre looking for:
‚Ä¢ Minimum of 5 years of experience in mobile application development with a strong portfolio of released applications.
‚Ä¢ Extensive experience with Firebase services and integrations in mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in mobile development frameworks and languages such as Flutter, React Native, Swift, Kotlin, and Java.
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of testing frameworks and debugging tools for mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with a proactive approach to identifying and resolving issues.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and maintain high-performance mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms using Flutter, React Native, or native languages (Swift, Kotlin).
‚Ä¢ Implement and manage Firebase services such as Authentication, Firestore, Realtime Database, Cloud Functions, Cloud Messaging, and Crashlytics to enhance mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code with a focus on reusability and best practices. Conduct unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing to ensure application stability and performance.
‚Ä¢ Identify and troubleshoot performance bottlenecks in mobile applications and optimise for maximum performance and user experience.

What Proxify offers
‚Ä¢ Career-accelerating positions at cutting-edge companies
‚Ä¢ Discover exclusive long-term remote engagements at the world's most interesting product companies.
‚Ä¢ Hand-picked opportunities, just for you
‚Ä¢ Skip the typical recruitment roadblocks and biases with personally matched engagements.
‚Ä¢ Fast-track your independent developer career
‚Ä¢ Start small and gain more freedom to take on new engagements as you build your independent developer career.
‚Ä¢ A recruitment process that values your time
‚Ä¢ Only one hiring process with the possibility of several positions, without any additional tests.

This offer from "Proxify" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.
